meanings.sent1: The jar was brimful of colorful marbles.
meanings.sent2: The bucket was brimful of water after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was brimful of surprises for the children.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was brimful of joy on her wedding day.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was brimful of sparkling jewels.
